title: 4 Pieces Real Silk Night Sleeping Cap Floral Print Silk Bonnet Hat with Ribbon (Pure Color)
features: Comfortable feelings: these night sleeping caps are made of soft real silk material, smooth to touch and soft to wear, they are gentle to your hair and skin, lightweight and breathable, comfortable for long time wearing, giving you an enjoyable using experience

Various ways to use: in addition to be worn during sleeping, the real silk sleep hat is also widely applied in many other activities, it can hold your hair firmly in place when you do makeup, wash face, do yoga, exercise, etc., providing much convenience in your everyday life

Proper gift choice: the soft smooth sleep cap is not only practical but also decorative, most women will love them, and they can be sweet gifts for your mother, wife, girlfriend or sister on birthday, Valentine's Day, wedding, anniversary, or other meaningful occasions, showing your love and care for them

What you will get: there are 4 pieces real silk sleep caps in this package, available in different styles, allowing you to wear according to your preferences, they are easy to match with your different pajamas, making you elegant and charming even during sleeping

Care your hair: our sleep bonnet cap with smooth surface can help to reduce frictions between hair and pillows, also will not bring too much burdens on your head while sleeping, will care your hair, keep your hair moisture even during the night
